sense.gloss: speaking about (one's thoughts, memories, etc.), relating (one's feelings, reminiscences, etc.), recollection, reminiscence

sdata.j: ↑毎朝↑↓まいあさ↓↑腕立↑↓うでた↓て↑伏↑↓ふ↓せを↑２０↑↓に|じゅっ↓↑回↑↓かい|↓やります。
sdata.e: He does twenty push-ups every morning.

sdata.j: 「トムは↑腕立↑↓うでた↓て↑何↑↓なん↓↑回↑↓かい↓できる？」「↑前↑↓まえ↓は↑100↑↓ひゃっ↓↑回↑↓かい↓くらい↑余裕↑↓よゆう↓だったけど↑今↑↓いま↓はどうだろ。↑50↑↓ご|じゅっ↓↑回↑↓かい|↓くらいかな」
sdata.e: How many push-ups can you do, Tom? "I used to be able to do a hundred easily, but I wonder how many I can do now. Maybe 50 or so?"

sdata.j: 「↑１０月↑↓じゅうがつ↓」は↑１↑↓いち↓↑年↑↓ねん↓の↑中↑↓なか↓で↑１０↑↓|じゅっ↓↑回↑↓かい|↓↑目↑↓め↓の↑月↑↓つき↓にあたります。
sdata.e: October is the tenth month of the year.
